directions: Put 6 cups watermelon, 1/2 of the cucumber, jalapeno pepper, and vinegar in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour gazpacho into a large bowl and stir remaining watermelon and cucumber into soup. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
Divide gazpacho among 4 bowls and top each with blueberries.
ingredients: 1 cucumber - peeled, seeded, and diced, divided
title: Fresh Watermelon Gazpacho
